content: MFT-DF M Mounting elements Mounting elements for extending façade mounting brackets (Medium) ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Accessories for façade systems- - ### FEATURES:Features Simpler façade installation – compensate wall unevenness without having to use a wall bracket with large cantilever Easy to use – clear alignment markings and improved grooves make MFT-DF mounting elements simpler to add and adjust Upgraded capacity – re-engineered for better static performance Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Extending the length of façade mounting brackets Suitable for all FOX V and FOX VI brackets ### TECHNICAL DATA: Height: 75 mm Material composition: EN AW-6063 T66 Technical Data | Height | 75 mm | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66 ### ITEMS- 2305955 - Mounting element MFT-DF 60 M - Package Size 100 pc - 2305952 - Mounting element MFT-DF 100 M - Package Size 100 pc
